title: Landing Page Logo Presence and Uniqueness
description: Verify that the landing page contains exactly one hero logo SVG with appropriate sizing and no duplicates.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page
Check that exactly one hero logo SVG element is present
Verify the logo SVG is correctly sized and visually clear
Confirm there are no duplicate logos on the page

title: Landing Page Logo Animations and Prefers-Reduced-Motion
description: Ensure that hero logo animations include fade, scale, and float loop effects and respect user prefers-reduced-motion settings.

steps.description: Load the landing page with default motion preferences
Verify the hero logo performs fade, scale, and float loop animations smoothly
Set system or browser to prefers-reduced-motion enabled
Confirm that animations are either disabled or reduced according to accessibility settings

title: Branding Assets Load Successfully
description: Validate that all branding assets such as logo SVG, favicon, and app icons load successfully returning HTTP 200 and correct MIME types with no 404 errors.

steps.description: Open the application landing page and other relevant pages
Monitor network requests to logo SVG, favicon, and icon assets
Verify all branding asset requests return HTTP status 200
Confirm MIME types for SVG, PNG, and other assets match expected correct types
Ensure no 404 or other error statuses are present in network panel

title: Header Logo Accessibility and Navigation
description: Verify that the header logo is always visible, accessible with alt text, has focus outlines and navigates to the home page when clicked.

steps.description: Navigate to any application page including protected routes
Check that the header logo is visible and includes descriptive alt text
Tab to the logo and confirm visible focus outline
Click on the header logo
Verify that the application navigates to the home landing page

title: Email/Password Authentication Success
description: Test email/password authentication success results in redirect to dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-in page
Input valid registered email and correct password
Submit the sign-in form
Confirm the user is redirected to the dashboard page

title: Email/Password Authentication Failure with Descriptive Error
description: Test invalid email/password authentication attempt shows friendly, descriptive error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-in page
Input invalid email and/or incorrect password
Submit the sign-in form
Validate error message is shown describing issue clearly

title: Google Sign-In Success and Firestore User Document Creation
description: Verify Google Sign-In popup flow creates Firestore user document on success and signs user in.

steps.description: Navigate to sign-in page
Click Google Sign-In button
Complete authentication in the Google OAuth popup
Confirm sign-in completion redirects to dashboard
Verify user document is created or updated in Firestore

title: Google Sign-In Unauthorized Domain Error Handling
description: Ensure Google Sign-In fails with suitable error messaging when used from unauthorized domains.

steps.description: Attempt Google Sign-In from an unauthorized domain or misconfigured app origin
Confirm popup error appears with clear messaging about unauthorized domain
Ensure no partial or confusing login states remain

title: Plan Gating for Dashboard Feature Access
description: Verify that users on Free plan attempting to access premium dashboard features are prompted to upgrade and redirected accordingly.

steps.description: Sign in as a user with Free plan
Attempt to navigate to a premium dashboard feature page
Confirm user is redirected to upgrade page with a prompt

title: Protected Routes Redirect for Unauthenticated Users
description: Ensure unauthenticated users cannot access protected routes and are redirected to sign-in page.

steps.description: Attempt to access dashboard or other protected routes without authenticating
Confirm automatic redirect to sign-in page

title: Routing and Navigation Components Functionality
description: Verify navigation components and routing logic including protected routes, redirects when unauthorized, and plan gating.

steps.description: Sign in with different user plans (Free, Starter, Pro, Premium)
Navigate through application routes including landing, dashboard, upgrade, and pricing
Confirm navigation menus reflect user permissions correctly
Validate redirects and access restrictions according to user plan

title: Accessibility Compliance on Landing and Auth Pages
description: Run accessibility audit (axe-core) and verify zero critical violations on landing page and authentication pages.

steps.description: Navigate to landing page
Run axe-core accessibility audit and confirm zero critical violations
Navigate to sign-in and sign-up pages
Run axe-core accessibility audit and confirm zero critical violations

title: Responsive Layouts and No Visual Layout Shifts
description: Test multiple device breakpoints for responsive layouts with no layout shifts or overlaps on both mobile and desktop views.

steps.description: Load app pages in viewports for mobile, tablet, and desktop sizes
Ensure layout adapts correctly with no overlapping or clipped UI elements
Verify no unexpected layout shifts occur during page load and interactions

title: Lighthouse Audits Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, SEO
description: Run Lighthouse audits on key pages confirming scores â‰¥90 for Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO categories.

steps.description: Open landing, sign-in, dashboard, and upgrade pages
Run Lighthouse audits for each page
Verify each category (Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, SEO) scores 90 or above

title: PWA Manifest and Service Worker Configuration
description: Verify that the PWA manifest and service worker are correctly configured to enable installability, offline caching, and maskable icons.

steps.description: Inspect manifest.webmanifest for correct fields including maskable icons
Confirm that manifest icons match assets and include maskable icon
Verify service worker registration and activation in the browser
Test offline capabilities by loading app with network offline
Confirm prompt to install PWA on supported Android/iOS devices

title: Dark/Light Mode Theme Switching
description: Test dark and light theme toggles maintain logo legibility, UI clarity, and user preferences.

steps.description: Load the application in default theme
Toggle dark/light theme using theme switcher UI
Verify UI components and logos maintain correct color contrast and clarity in both themes
Reload the application and check if user theme preference persists

title: Language Switching with i18next
description: Validate seamless language switching via UI toggles using i18next integration with correct translations and no page reloads.

steps.description: Navigate to any major page
Use language selector to switch between supported languages
Verify all visible UI text updates promptly to selected language without page reload
Ensure no untranslated strings or layout breaks occur

title: Pricing Page and Plan Management
description: Verify pricing and plan management pages display accurate plan comparisons, features, and upgrade paths.

steps.description: Navigate to pricing and plan management pages
Check that all subscription plans (Free, Starter, Pro, Premium) and features are clearly listed
Verify upgrade call-to-actions work and route user to proper upgrade workflow

title: Error Boundaries and Custom Error Pages
description: Trigger application errors to test error boundaries catch issues and display custom error pages gracefully.

steps.description: Simulate application errors or exceptions in components
Verify error boundaries display user-friendly error messages and custom error pages
Confirm navigation allows recovery from error states

title: No Console Errors or Network Failures on Critical Routes
description: Verify on critical application routes that no console errors or network failures occur.

steps.description: Open main routes: /, /auth/sign-in, /dashboard, /upgrade
Monitor browser console for errors or warnings
Verify all network requests succeed with appropriate status codes
